Edison Welding Institute
1100 Kinnear Road
Columbus, OH 43212
ATTN: Executive Director

VIA: USPS Certified Mail, Return Receipt Requested - # 7012 1640 0002 4101 6122

- RE: Land Lease by and between The Ohio State University (as Landlord), and Edison Welding Institute (as Tenant) dated April 1, 1995, for interest in real property located at 1248 Arthur Adams Drive, Columbus, Ohio.

To Whom It May Concern,

Please consider this official notice that Landlord's Official Notice Address has changed. Please adjust your records to reflect the follow address for all leased related communication:

The Ohio State University
Physical Planning and Real Estate
2003 Millikin Road
Suite 200, McCracken
Columbus, OH 43210
Attn: Lease Administrator

Additionally, Landlord would like to establish a formal contact for all lease related communication. Please adjust your records to show the following official lease contact:

Neil Perry, Transaction/Lease Administrator
Perry.1697@busfin.osu.edu
Office: 614-688-3715
Direct: 614-292-7872
Fax: 614-292-4824

Thank you in advance for your prompt attention to these recent changes. Should you have any questions regarding this, please don't hesitate to let me know.

Regards,
<signature>
Neil Perry
Transaction/Lease Administrator
